game: Survive the Troll is a multiplayer game in which one Troll fights against up to 9 Elves.GameplayIn the Cloudy Arena you will be provided with two kinds of gameplay:The Troll is playing solo against all the elves. His goal? To crush every Elf he sees. To do so he can upgrade his stats in his base the Troll Hut. He gets passive income using troll wards which allow him to teleport throughout the map. The Troll is hungry... Hungry for Elf meat!The Elf is playing with a bunch of other Elves up to a maximum of 9. In order to survive the Troll they will have to build a base with a House a Wall and a Tower which attacks the Troll when it's close. Yet their goal is not to stay in their base forever in order to continue expanding their income they will have to cooperate in order to get gifts that contain essential resources or troll wards! In the end they may even take down the Troll ... ]CustomizationYou can customize your look with a system of skins that you can setup and buy in the Market on the main menu.You can only gain Wcoins (which are used to buy skins) by playing the game ! This game is thought to be a "chill" game so there are no ranks and ranking system.
